bug.description:
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/01org/mkl-dnn/blob/master/tests/gtests/gtest/src/gtest.cc#L3869>https://github.com/01org/mkl-dnn/blob/master/tests/gtests/gtest/src/gtest.cc#L3869</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-code>error: ignoring return value of ‘size_t fwrite(const void*, size_t, size_t, FILE*)’, declared with attribute warn_unused_result [-Werror=unused-result] </denchmark-code>
Compiler: GCC 4.9.4 This warning is enabled by -Wall, should we modify the code to fix it or modify the GCC compile options?
